items.title: Can Cows and Solar Power Coexist? We’re About to Find Out
items.description: LANCASTER, Ky.—It is unusual to have a utility-scale solar array in Kentucky, and even more unusual that the grounds crew here is a live-in flock of more than a thousand sheep.
